statements: SELECT * FROM medical_inventory;
SELECT item_name, expiry_date FROM medical_inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT id, category FROM medical_inventory WHERE expiry_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM medical_inventory WHERE category='Medicine' ORDER BY expiry_date ASC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM medicaljson_inventory WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM medical_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY item_name DESC
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM medical_inventory WHERE category='Medication'
SELECT item_name, quantity, category FROM medical_inventory WHERE expiry_date < DATE('2022-01-01') ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT id, item_name, category FROM medical_inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 20
SELECT * FROM medical_inventory WHERE item_name LIKE '%pill%'
SELECT id, name, quantity, expiration_date FROM medical_supplies WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT name, expiration_date, quantity FROM medical_supplies WHERE expiration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE name LIKE 'Def%' ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT id, name FROM medical_supplies WHERE quantity = 0;
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01' AND purchase_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM medical_supplies WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT id, name, quantity FROM equipment WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT name, quantity FROM medical_supplies WHERE name LIKE 'Bandage%' AND expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT id, name, expiration_date FROM medical_supplies WHERE quantity = (SELECT MIN(quantity) FROM medical_supplies);
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM medical_supplies WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT supply_name, quantity FROM medical_supplies WHERE manufacturer LIKE 'Johnson%';
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE type = 'Surgical';
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM equipment ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity <= 10;
SELECT * FROM medical_supplies WHERE quantity > 20 AND manufacturer LIKE '%Corp%';
SELECT equipment_name, type FROM equipment ORDER BY equipment_name ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_inventory_items FROM inventory;
SELECT * FROM medical_supplies;
SELECT name, quantity FROM medical_supplies WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT category, quantity FROM medical_equipment ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT name, location, contact_number FROM healthcare_facilities WHERE location LIKE '%Hospital%';
SELECT item_type, quantity_changed, log_date FROM inventory_log ORDER BY log_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM medical_supplies ORDER BY name DESC, expiration_date ASC
SELECT name, quantity FROM medical_equipment WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT id, name, category FROM medical_equipment JOIN inventory_log ON medical_equipment.id = inventory_log.item_id
SELECT * FROM healthcare_facilities WHERE location LIKE 'City%'
SELECT SUM(quantity_changed) FROM inventory_log
SELECT * FROM hospital;
SELECT name, location FROM hospital ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE type = 'Surgical';
SELECT staff_id, name, role FROM staff WHERE role = 'Doctor';
SELECT * FROM hospital ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY item_name ASC
SELECT t.transaction_date, t.item_name, i.name as hospital_name FROM transactions t JOIN hospital i ON t.hospital_id = i.hospital_id WHERE t.type='purchase' ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT s.name, e.name as equipment_name FROM staff s LEFT JOIN equipment e ON s.staff_id = e.hospital_id ORDER BY s.name
SELECT DISTINCT hospital_id, count(*) as num_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY hospital_id ORDER BY num_transactions DESC LIMIT 3
